definition: to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
initiative (as in "seize the initiative")/advantageous position that allows one to call the shots

sentences.english: Is the production line fully auto?
The way to be happy is to let go, and reach out.
sentences.chinese: 快乐的途径是不计前嫌，主动和好。

sentences.english: The accident of aortic cannulation is very dangerous and the mortality of this complication is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 主动脉插管意外极为凶险，死亡率非常高。

sentences.english: Improvements will be made, and you will have a more positive outlook on life in general.
sentences.chinese: 本会有厘正，将对生在总体上有更主动的见解。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of continuous suture in aortic valve replacement.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨主动脉瓣置换中连续缝合方法的应用。

sentences.english: This proactive alert enables you to accelerate the recovery from downtimes.
sentences.chinese: 这种积极主动的提醒，您可以加快恢复停工。

sentences.english: Will you say hello to your neighbor?
sentences.chinese: 你会主动和新邻居打招呼吗？
你是个做事主动的人吗？

sentences.english: The membrane-stripping mechanism includes an active retracting roller and a driven heating roller.
sentences.chinese: 剥膜装置包括主动卷收滚轴及从动加热滚轴。

sentences.english: Honeypot skill is one of the active defense network security techniques.
sentences.chinese: 蜜罐技术是一种主动防御的网络安全技术。

sentences.english: Yeats imagines a kind of active arson in this poem.
sentences.chinese: 叶芝在诗里想象了主动燃火。

sentences.english: He sees things, active request to find cures textual.
sentences.chinese: 他看到情况不妙，主动要求找扁鹊来治病。

sentences.english: Connect the vent hose to the axle shaft tube.
sentences.chinese: 向主动轴管上连接通风管。

sentences.english: You can use this pattern when you're offering something
sentences.chinese: 当你主动提供一些东西的时候，你可以使用这个句型。

sentences.english: She is feminine, sensuous and would never take the lead.
sentences.chinese: 她是非常女性化的，性感的，但绝不会主动。

sentences.english: You have to be proactive about this.

definition: counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
to think up every possible method (idiom); to devise ways and means/to try this, that and the other
direct (opposite: indirect 間接|间接[jian4 jie1])/immediate/straightforward
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
